channel.title: Modeling/Animation/GFX Software
channel.description: Does anyone know any software that I can make models, animations, and gfx's? I would eventually like to make my own skill using custom npcs/objects/items, animations, and gfx's. The idea for a new skill that I have is Necromancy. So a lot of animations/gfx's will be required lol. If anyone could give me a list of good software, doesn't matter if it's free or not, I would greatly appreciate it.

item.title: Modeling/Animation/GFX Software
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

You do know we have an entire section based on modelling right? Go visit there

Read full topic
